name: Nemesis: The Wizardry Adventure
summary: Nemesis: The Wizardry Adventure is a 1996 adventure and role-playing video game developed and published by Sir-Tech. It is a spin-off of the Wizardry series of games. Ports for Sega Saturn and Microsoft Windows were released in Japan in 1998.
info:
• 开发: Sir-Tech
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: SS
  • 平台: DOS
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1996年
  • 导演: Linda Currie
  • 剧本: Linda Currie, Brenda Brathwaite
  • 程序: Derek Beland, Bret Rowdon
